text: Pere Tàpias (19 May 1946 – 22 April 2017) () was a Spanish radio presenter and food writer in Catalonia, Spain. He was the host of a Catalunya Ràdio program, Tàpies Variades. He was the 2005–2006 Ambassor of Xató. He was born in Vilanova i la Geltrú, Spain. Tàpias died on 22 April 2017 from liver disease in Sant Pere de Ribes, Spain at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Radio personalities Category:Food and drink critics
